title: KurangKerjaan
author: KurangKerjaan
content: The GreenChainA decentralized and eco-friendly blockchain that enables everyone to farm by using their free disk storage We are using Proof of Storage and Time consensus mechanism which is a huge leap forward in the blockchain world.TheGreenChain Features & Utility- TheGreen Swap Platform- TheGreenChain Proof-Of-Stake Platform- Security- TheGreenChain Mainnet BlockchainTheGreenChain Tokenomics- Liquidity 5%- Marketing 4%- Buyback 2%- Go Green Fund 1%TheGreenChain Officials Link :Fairlaunch Countdown time : https://thegreenchain.network/Telegram : https://t.me/thegreenchain

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: KurangKerjaan on October 02, 2022, 09:56:02 PMThe GreenChainA decentralized and eco-friendly blockchain that enables everyone to farm by using their free disk storage We are using Proof of Storage and Time consensus mechanism which is a huge leap forward in the blockchain world.~A decentralized and eco-friendly blockchain as tokens minted on the BSC network? I must admit that this is the first time I have heard that such a thing is possible. Please tell us more about it. Â You have nice trust feedback, by the way.
